Intro Want to run JetBrains Rider in your WSL environment? I recently navigated this process and want to share my insights.
With WSL2’s support for GUI apps, this is now possible, though not without some hurdles. Download Rider EAP Here’s how to start: Download the  installation file for the Linux EAP version in Windows. Extract the files to  using these commands: Launching Rider Launch Rider with the rider.sh script: Troubleshooting Rider didn’t launch for me: I encountered an error related to libXrender.so.1. It turns out I was missing some rendering…
